meanings.definition: Used to introduce a statement that is true if and only if the preceding statement is true.
meanings.sent1: I will go to the park iff the weather is nice.
meanings.sent2: You can come in iff you take off your shoes.
meanings.sent3: I'll eat my vegetables iff you eat yours first!
meanings.sent4: She will sing at the concert iff her best friend joins her.
meanings.sent5: The door will open iff you press the green button.
